text: The white wagtail (Motacilla alba) is a species of bird. ==Conservation== They are not an endangered species. They have a stable population of between 130 million and 300 million adult birds. They are found in Europe, Asia and northern Africa. It is possible that climate change is affecting their migration. ==Pied wagtail== The pied wagtail is a subspecies of the white wagtail.They are 18cm long, have a wingspan of between 25 and 30cm and weigh between 17 and 25grams. == References == Category:Birds of Europe Category:Birds of Asia Category:Birds of Africa Category:Passeri Category:National symbols of Latvia
title: White wagtail
